statements: SELECT * FROM election_data WHERE winning_candidate = TRUE;
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation FROM election_data WHERE votes_received > 10000;
SELECT party_affiliation, SUM(votes_received) AS total_votes FROM election_data GROUP BY party_affiliation;
SELECT * FROM election_data WHERE election_year = 2020 ORDER BY votes_received DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation FROM election_data WHERE party_affiliation IN ('Democrat', 'Republican') ORDER BY candidate_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM election_data WHERE votes_received > 100000 ORDER BY candidate_name DESC;
SELECT election_year, candidate_name, party_affiliation FROM election_data WHERE winning_candidate = true;
SELECT candidate_name, votes_received FROM election_data GROUP BY candidate_name HAVING SUM(votes_received) > 50000;
SELECT * FROM election_data WHERE party_affiliation = 'Republican' ORDER BY votes_received DESC;
SELECT election_year, MAX(votes_received) AS max_votes FROM election_data GROUP BY election_year ORDER BY max_votes DESC;
SELECT * FROM elections;
SELECT election_name, election_date FROM elections WHERE election_id = 1;
SELECT candidate_name, votes_received, percentage FROM election_results WHERE election_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM election_results ORDER BY percentage DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, SUM(votes_received) AS total_votes FROM election_results GROUP BY candidate_name;
SELECT * FROM elections WHERE election_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT election_name, candidate_name, votes_received FROM elections JOIN election_results ON elections.election_id = election_results.election_id;
SELECT candidate_name, SUM(votes_received) AS total_votes FROM election_results GROUP BY candidate_name;
SELECT * FROM election_results WHERE percentage > 50 ORDER BY votes_received DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT election_name, candidate_name FROM elections JOIN election_results ON elections.election_id = election_results.election_id ORDER BY election_name, candidate_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_election_data ORDER BY election_year DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, total_votes FROM historical_election_data WHERE winning_party = 'Republican';
SELECT candidate_name, election_year, total_votes FROM historical_election_data WHERE election_year = 2020;
SELECT MAX(total_votes) AS max_votes FROM historical_election_data;
SELECT trend_category, AVG(trend_value) AS average_value FROM trend_analysis GROUP BY trend_category ORDER BY average_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_election_data ORDER BY election_year DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, total_votes FROM historical_election_data WHERE winning_party = 'Democratic' ORDER BY total_votes DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, vote_count, result_status FROM election_results WHERE vote_count > 100000 ORDER BY vote_count DESC;
SELECT analysis_date, trend_category, interpretation FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_value BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.0 ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT election_id, candidate_name, total_votes, winning_party FROM historical_election_data WHERE winning_party = 'Republican' ORDER BY total_votes DESC;
SELECT * FROM election_results;
SELECT candidate_name, votes FROM election_results WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT district_name, region FROM election_districts ORDER BY region ASC;
SELECT party_name, ideology FROM election_parties WHERE ideology = 'Liberal';
SELECT trend_name, trend_value FROM election_trends WHERE trend_value > 0.5 ORDER BY trend_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM election_results WHERE year = 2020 ORDER BY votes DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT candidate_name, SUM(votes) AS total_votes FROM election_results GROUP BY candidate_name;
SELECT district_name, region, SUM(votes) AS total_votes FROM election_results JOIN election_districts ON election_results.election_id = election_districts.district_id GROUP BY district_name, region;
SELECT party_name, AVG(votes) AS avg_votes FROM election_results JOIN election_parties ON election_results.election_id = election_parties.party_id GROUP BY party_name;
SELECT trend_name, trend_value FROM election_trends WHERE trend_value > 0.5 ORDER BY trend_name ASC;
SELECT election_year, candidate FROM elections
SELECT state_name, region FROM states
SELECT party_name, ideology FROM parties
SELECT candidate_name FROM candidates
SELECT trend_data FROM trends
SELECT * FROM elections ORDER BY election_year DESC, votes ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT candidate_name, party_name, ideology FROM candidates JOIN parties ON candidates.party_id = parties.party_id WHERE party_name = 'Republican';
SELECT state_name, count(*) as num_candidates FROM candidates JOIN states ON candidates.candidate_id = states.state_id GROUP BY state_name ORDER BY num_candidates DESC;
SELECT election_year, sum(votes) as total_votes FROM elections GROUP BY election_year ORDER BY total_votes DESC;

SELECT state_name, AVG(votes) as avg_votes FROM candidates JOIN states ON candidates.candidate_id = states.state_id JOIN elections ON candidates.election_id = elections.election_id GROUP BY state_name ORDER BY avg_votes DESC;
